item.description:
This event is for advanced speakers.

 

The number of seats is very limited because the cafe is very popular and also to keep our group more intimate. There are usually lots of regulars and some interesting new people. Great way to meet new friends, many natives from America Latina. 


Learn who else went last time and discover what everybodies saying.

Five stars and lot's and lot's of people: 

http://www.meetup.com/bostonspanish/events/32647192/

 

thank you for clicking and see you there! :)

Josh

 

P.S. I am also the organizer of The Boston Volunteer Meetup. 

More than thirty four hundred volunteers.

Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the HUGE group of Spanish speakers standing next to the door. :)

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Español en Coolidge Corner? Quién mas...
